languages.text: "Не беспокойтесь, со мной мои навигаторские силы. Статистически говоря, у вас куда больше шансов погибнуть в бою. Ох, то есть, это не совсем то, что я хотела сказать..."
"Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."
languages.original_text: "Не беспокойтесь, со мной мои навигаторские силы. Статистически говоря, у вас куда больше шансов погибнуть в бою. Ох, то есть, это не совсем то, что я хотела сказать..."

traits.locale_text: "Fear not, I have my Navigator skills to call upon. Statistically speaking, you are far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fear not, I have my Navigator skills to call upon. Statistically speaking, you are far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fear not, I have my Navigator skills to call upon. Statistically speaking, you are far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fear not, I have my Navigator skills to call upon. Statistically speaking, you are far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “确实如此。虽然我可以用我的导航者技能来帮助你，但从统计学角度而言，你还是有很高的几率会战死沙场。噢，抱歉，我可能说错话了……”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."

traits.locale_text: “不要怕，我可以用我的导航者技能来帮助你。从统计学角度而言，你有很高的几率会战死沙场。噢，抱歉，我可能说错话了……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Así es. Mientras que yo cuento con mis habilidades como Navegante, estadísticamente, es mucho más probable que muera usted en batalla. Ah, eh... no quería decir eso».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."

traits.locale_text: «No tema: yo cuento con mis habilidades como Navegante. Estadísticamente, es mucho más probable que muera usted en batalla. Ah, eh... no quería decir eso».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「その通り。私には、航宙士としての技術がありますが、統計的に言えば、あなたのほうが戦場で生命を落とす可能性は高いのですから。ああ、今の表現はおかしかったわね…」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."

traits.locale_text: 「恐れることはありません。私には、航宙士としての技術があるのです。統計的に言えば、あなたのほうが戦場で生命を落とす可能性は高いのですから。ああ、今の表現はおかしかったわね…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "In der Tat. Während ich mich auf meine navigatorischen Fähigkeiten verlassen kann, ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass Ihr im Kampf sterbt, statistisch betrachtet deutlich höher. Oh, das klang jetzt irgendwie falsch ..."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."

traits.locale_text: "Keine Angst, auf meine navigatorischen Fähigkeiten ist Verlass. Statistisch gesehen ist es weit wahrscheinlicher, dass Ihr in der Schlacht fallt. Oh, das klang jetzt irgendwie falsch ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « En effet. Statistiquement parlant, tant que je pourrai compter sur mes talents de navigatrice, vous avez plus de chances de périr au combat. Oh, peut-être que cela ne vous rassure pas... »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."

traits.locale_text: « Ne craignez rien, vous pouvez compter toujours sur mes talents de navigatrice. Statistiquement parlant, vous avez de toute façon plus de chances de périr au combat. Oh, peut-être que cela ne vous rassure pas... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."

languages.text: "Merak etme. Rotacılık yeteneklerim emrime amade. İstatistiki olarak savaşta senin ölmen daha muhtemel. Affedersin, yanlış ifade ettim galiba."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. While I have my Navigator skills to call upon, you are, statistically speaking, far more likely to perish in battle. Oh, I mean, that came out wrong..."

traits.locale_text: "Merak etme. Rotacılık yeteneklerim emrime amade. İstatistiki olarak savaşta senin ölmen daha muhtemel. Affedersin, yanlış ifade ettim galiba."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
